verbs.description: [ARG1: The release of three Americans from North Korea] [V: is] [ARG2: the latest goodwill gesture by the North before leader Kim Jong Un holds a historic summit with President Trump in the coming weeks to discuss denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula] .

The release of three Americans from North Korea is the latest goodwill gesture by the North before [ARG0: leader Kim Jong Un] [V: holds] [ARG1: a historic summit with President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: in the coming weeks] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula] .

The release of three Americans from North Korea is the latest goodwill gesture by the North before leader Kim Jong Un holds a historic summit with President Trump in the [V: coming] [ARG1: weeks] to discuss denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula .

The release of three Americans from North Korea is the latest goodwill gesture by the North before [ARG0: leader Kim Jong Un] holds a historic summit with President Trump in the coming weeks to [V: discuss] [ARG1: denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula] .
